name: Lash Sculpt Lengthen and Lift Mascara
about: What it is: A lengthening and lifting mascara that sculpts and separates lashes with the unique, curved, comb-like applicator..Formulation Type: Lengthening..Benefits: Long-wearing..What Else You Need to Know: REFY Lash Sculpt creates a sculpted, lifted, lengthened lash for an all day lifted hold. The non-transfer, pigmented formula contains a duo of waxes that are also in our Brow Sculpt, helping to sculpt and set the lash. The unique, curved, comb-like applicator targets each lash to separate and lengthen, creating a high impact finish..
ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Acrylates Copolymer, Paraffin, Synthetic Beeswax, Glycerin, Palmitic Acid, VP/Eicosene Copolymer, Polybutene, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Mica, Acacia Senegal Gum, Glyceryl Stearate, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Phenoxyethanol, Stearic Acid, PEG-100 Stearate, Tocopheryl Acetate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Alcohol, Panthenol, Hydroxyethyl Cellulose, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, PPG-2-Deceth-30, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Dimethicone, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Acetate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Pantolactone, Biotin, CI 77499.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- To sculpt, comb through lashes from root to tip..- Use the shorter bristles for your inner lashes and the longer bristles for your outer lashes..- Insert the curved applicator back into the bottle at an angle and screw to close.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lengthens my lashes, it’s the perfect my lashes but better.
I LOVE THISS SOOOO MUCHHH! It made my flat lashes look super long and stayed in all day. It also does not make my lashes clumpy, IT IS A MUST HAVE FOR MEEEE
